pullrequest.title: Expanding the functionality of the plugin framework, and introducing PluginPtr and specializations

content.raw:
Can these ones be fixed?

```
/src/StringUtils.cc:19:  Found C++ system header after a header this file implements. Should be: c system, c++ system, other, StringUtils.h .  [build/include_order] [4]
./src/PluginLoader.cc:74:  More than one command on the same line  [whitespace/newline] [4]
./src/PluginLoader.cc:250:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./include/ignition/common/detail/SuppressWarning.hh:97:  At least two spaces is best between code and comments  [whitespace/comments] [2]
[...]
./include/ignition/common/detail/SpecializedPlugin.hh:279:  Missing spaces around >>  [whitespace/operators] [3]
./include/ignition/common/detail/PluginLoader.hh:23:  Found C++ system header after a header this file implements. Should be: c system, c++ system, other, PluginLoader.h .  [build/include_order] [4]
[...]
./include/ignition/common/detail/Plugin.hh:23:  Found C++ system header after a header this file implements. Should be: c system, c++ system, other, Plugin.h .  [build/include_order] [4]
```
